values.value: +2 dice for healing, illusion, and detection spells. As a wildemess totem, +2 dice for conjuring any one Spirit of the Land (shaman's choice). As an urban totem, +2 dice for conjuring any one Spirit of Man (shaman's choice).
Snake is a wise healer who dwells in many places and knows many secrets. Snake is a good councilor, but exacts a price for her advice. Snake is adaptable, and can confuse the senses of enemies.

Snake will not fight unless she must defend herself or else hunt to eat. Snake shamans have a -1 die modifier for any spells cast during combat. Snake shamans are obsessed with learning secrets and will take enormous risks to do so.
